Title: Episode #1.4
Writer: Julian Fellowes (written and created by), Shelagh Stephenson
Actors: Hugh Bonneville, Jessica Brown Findlay, Laura Carmichael, Jim Carter
Plot: Mrs. Hughes is reunited with an old beau, now a widower proposing marriage, and the Countess hires Matthew Crawley to see if the will can be broken and disagrees with his mother on a diagnosis.
